::Spears:;

She smiled at Prebon as she took his arm. "Thank you Master Prebon. 
You are most generous." She smiled and kises his cheek a third 
time. "Master, if there is anything that I can do for you to show my 
gratitude......?"  she let her voice trail off as she smiled at 
Prebon.  The chip was starting to take her mind over as well.  And 
she was slowly becoming more of Prebon's slave as each hour passed.  

She turned her head to Striker and felt her spark sink.  She still 
had love for him and hated to see him in this manner. Seeing him 
caged and hurt.  It killed her to see him like this.  She turned and 
faced Prebon again, smiling at him. "Come, let us leave this place of 
unhappiness. Sure master, you have other more pleasent things to do?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Prebon
> 
> He smiled at Spears.
> 
> "You are a very special bot. I can feel it. I'm glad you are the 
one 
> who came to me. If you give great loyalty I may....set you free as 
> well. I would of course have to erase your memory of everything 
that 
> happened so you wouldn't know my plans, but I would let you free. 
> It's not a promise, but we'll see."
